2: גַּם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>Even</n> הַ֭יּוֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>Even to day</n> מְרִ֣י <sup>4805 </sup> <n>bitter</n> שִׂחִ֑י <sup>7879 </sup> <n>[is] my complaint</n> יָ֝דִ֗י <sup>3027 </sup> <n>my stroke</n> כָּבְדָ֥ה <sup>3513 </sup> <n>is heavier</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>despite</n> אַנְחָתִֽי׃ <sup>585 </sup> <n>than my groaning</n>
3: מִֽי־ <sup>4310 </sup> <n>Oh</n> יִתֵּ֣ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>Oh that</n> יָ֭דַעְתִּי <sup>3045 </sup> <n>I knew</n> וְאֶמְצָאֵ֑הוּ <sup>4672 </sup> <n>where I might find</n> אָ֝ב֗וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>him [that] I might come</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> תְּכוּנָתֽוֹ׃ <sup>8499 </sup> <n>[even] to his seat</n>
4: אֶעֶרְכָ֣ה <sup>6186 </sup> <n>I would order</n> לְפָנָ֣יו <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> מִשְׁפָּ֑ט <sup>4941 </sup> <n>[my] cause</n> וּ֝פִ֗י <sup>6310 </sup> <n>my mouth</n> אֲמַלֵּ֥א <sup>4390 </sup> <n>him and fill</n> תוֹכָחֽוֹת׃ <sup>8433 </sup> <n>with arguments</n>
5: אֵ֭דְעָה <sup>3045 </sup> <n>I would know</n> מִלִּ֣ים <sup>4405 </sup> <n>the words</n> יַעֲנֵ֑נִי <sup>6030 </sup> <n>[which] he would answer</n> וְ֝אָבִ֗ינָה <sup>995 </sup> <n>me and understand</n> מַה־ <sup>4100 </sup> <n>what</n> יֹּ֥אמַר <sup>559 </sup> <n>what he would say</n> לִֽי׃
6: הַבְּרָב־ <sup>7227 </sup> <n>in abundance</n> כֹּ֭חַ <sup>3581 </sup> <n>ability</n> יָרִ֣יב <sup>7378 </sup> <n>Will he plead</n> עִמָּדִ֑י <sup>5978 </sup> <n>against</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> אַךְ־ <sup>389 </sup> <n>surely</n> ה֝֗וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> יָשִׂ֥ם <sup>7760 </sup> <n>pay</n> בִּֽי׃
7: שָׁ֗ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>There</n> יָ֭שָׁר <sup>3477 </sup> <n>There the righteous</n> נוֹכָ֣ח <sup>3198 </sup> <n>might dispute</n> עִמּ֑וֹ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>and I</n> וַאֲפַלְּטָ֥ה <sup>6403 </sup> <n>with him so should I be delivered</n> לָ֝נֶ֗צַח <sup>5331 </sup> <n>for ever</n> מִשֹּׁפְטִֽי׃ <sup>8199 </sup> <n>from my judge</n>
8: הֵ֤ן <sup>2005 </sup> <n>Behold</n> קֶ֣דֶם <sup>6924 </sup> <n>forward</n> אֶהֱלֹ֣ךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>Behold I go</n> וְאֵינֶ֑נּוּ <sup>369 </sup> <n>else</n> וְ֝אָח֗וֹר <sup>268 </sup> <n>but he [is] not [there] and backward</n> וְֽלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>cannot</n> אָבִ֥ין <sup>995 </sup> <n>but I cannot perceive</n> לֽוֹ׃
9: שְׂמֹ֣אול <sup>8040 </sup> <n>On the left hand</n> בַּעֲשֹׂת֣וֹ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>where he doth work</n> וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>cannot</n> אָ֑חַז <sup>2372 </sup> <n>but I cannot behold</n> יַעְטֹ֥ף <sup>5848 </sup> <n>[him] he hideth</n> יָ֝מִ֗ין <sup>3225 </sup> <n>himself on the right hand</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>cannot</n> אֶרְאֶֽה׃ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>that I cannot see</n>
10: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> יָ֭דַע <sup>3045 </sup> <n>But he knoweth</n> דֶּ֣רֶךְ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>the way</n> עִמָּדִ֑י <sup>5978 </sup> <n>that I take</n> בְּ֝חָנַ֗נִי <sup>974 </sup> <n>[when] he hath tried</n> כַּזָּהָ֥ב <sup>2091 </sup> <n>as gold</n> אֵצֵֽא׃ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>me I shall come forth</n>
11: בַּ֭אֲשֻׁרוֹ <sup>838 </sup> <n>his steps</n> אָחֲזָ֣ה <sup>270 </sup> <n>hath held</n> רַגְלִ֑י <sup>7272 </sup> <n>My foot</n> דַּרְכּ֖וֹ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>his way</n> שָׁמַ֣רְתִּי <sup>8104 </sup> <n>have I kept</n> וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and not</n> אָֽט׃ <sup>5186 </sup> <n>and not declined</n>
12: מִצְוַ֣ת <sup>4687 </sup> <n>from the commandment</n> שְׂ֭פָתָיו <sup>8193 </sup> <n>of his lips</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>have not</n> אָמִ֑ישׁ <sup>4185 </sup> <n>Neither have I gone back</n> מֵ֝חֻקִּ֗י <sup>2706 </sup> <n>more than my necessary</n> צָפַ֥נְתִּי <sup>6845 </sup> <n>I have esteemed</n> אִמְרֵי־ <sup>561 </sup> <n>the words</n> פִֽיו׃ <sup>6310 </sup> <n>of his mouth</n>
13: וְה֣וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>He</n> בְ֭אֶחָד <sup>259 </sup> <n>But he [is] in one</n> וּמִ֣י <sup>4310 </sup> <n>and who</n> יְשִׁיבֶ֑נּוּ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>[mind] and who can turn</n> וְנַפְשׁ֖וֹ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>him? and [what] his soul</n> אִוְּתָ֣ה <sup>183 </sup> <n>desireth</n> וַיָּֽעַשׂ׃ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>even [that] he doeth</n>
14: כִּ֭י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> יַשְׁלִ֣ים <sup>7999 </sup> <n>For he performeth</n> חֻקִּ֑י <sup>2706 </sup> <n>[the thing that is] appointed</n> וְכָהֵ֖נָּה <sup>2007 </sup> <n>such</n> רַבּ֣וֹת <sup>7227 </sup> <n>for me and many</n> עִמּֽוֹ׃ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n>
15: עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> כֵּ֭ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>at</n> מִפָּנָ֣יו <sup>6440 </sup> <n>at his presence</n> אֶבָּהֵ֑ל <sup>926 </sup> <n>Therefore am I troubled</n> אֶ֝תְבּוֹנֵ֗ן <sup>995 </sup> <n>when I consider</n> וְאֶפְחַ֥ד <sup>6342 </sup> <n>I am afraid</n> מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n>
16: וְ֭אֵל <sup>410 </sup> <n>For God</n> הֵרַ֣ךְ <sup>7401 </sup> <n>soft</n> לִבִּ֑י <sup>3820 </sup> <n>maketh my heart</n> וְ֝שַׁדַּ֗י <sup>7706 </sup> <n>and the Almighty</n> הִבְהִילָֽנִי׃ <sup>926 </sup> <n>troubleth</n>
17: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> נִ֭צְמַתִּי <sup>6789 </sup> <n>Because I was not cut off</n> מִפְּנֵי־ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> חֹ֑שֶׁךְ <sup>2822 </sup> <n>the darkness</n> וּ֝מִפָּנַ֗י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>from my face</n> כִּסָּה־ <sup>3680 </sup> <n>[neither] hath he covered</n> אֹֽפֶל׃ <sup>652 </sup> <n>the darkness</n>
